newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS - Bank of Qld says govt switches stake.
newsitem.headline: RTRS - Bank of Qld says govt switches stake.

text.p: The Bank of Queensland Ltd said on Monday the Queensland government had transfered its 45 percent stake in the bank to a government owned company, Queensland Treasury Holdings Pty Ltd.
The stake was previously held by Suncorp General Insurance Ltd, a Bank of Queensland spokesman said.

Suncorp's, parent, Suncorp Insurance and Finance, is in a three-way merger deal with fellow government-owned entity Queensland Industry Development Corp (QIDC) and listed Queensland-based bank Metway Bank Ltd.
